description:
Put the butter on the stove over low heat. When it is close to melting, add the sugar. He continues to chew. Salt is added. Add the vanilla. Eggs are added. Slowly add the flour. Add the baking powder.
Divide the composition into the paper containers. Chocolate and walnut are added.
Place the tray in the oven at 180 degrees for 18 minutes.
ingredients:
For 12 cupcakes:
12 shapes,
165g flour (Dinkel Mehl 630),
150g of butter,
120g of sugar,
17g baking powder,
3 eggs,
Blueberries & Blackberries & Nuts & Chocolate Chips,
Vanilla extract - one ampoule,
A pinch of salt
name: Cupcakes

description: Boil the milk and add the sugar. He was chewing. After the sugar melts, add the butter. Milk powder is mixed with cocoa. On top of the milk boiled with sugar and butter, slowly add milk powder with cocoa, chew so that lumps do not form. Add walnuts and crushed biscuits.
ingredients:
400g milk powder,
100g of sugar,
310g normal milk,
200g of butter,
100g cocoa,
1 small ampoule of rum essence,
200g biscuits,
Raisins and walnuts to taste
name: Biscuits Sausage

description:
The thighs are scalded, the thighs are cleaned, they are scalded a second time. Season, add olive oil, and put in the oven, in the yena dish, uncovered, for an hour and a quarter at 160C (the last 5 min at 180C and fan)

Wash and clean the mushrooms, game and pepper, cut into cubes. The adreiul in small cubes, the mushrooms in medium cubes, the eggplant in large cubes. Eggplants decrease by approximately 4 times, so larger cubes.
ingredients:
For the oven:
Chicken legs
Olive oil
Basil, hot pepper, pepper, salt

For the wok:
650g Mushrooms
1 pepper
1 venison
coriander, basil, pear and salt
name: Vietnamese chicken

description: Heat the grill to 8. Put the salmon. Leave for 6 minutes on one side, 6 on the other.
ingredients:
For the mujdei
Olive oil
Yogurt
Lemon
Garlic
Pepper, basil
name: Grilled salmon with garlic sauce

description:
Let the chickpeas soak in water for a few hours, until it triples in volume.
It is put to boil. The water in which it boils is kept. Cool in cold water. Keep a few grains for decoration. Put it in the blender together with the rest of the ingredients and part of the water in which it was boiled.
ingredients:
400g chickpeas
4 cloves of garlic
10 tablespoons olive oil (or more)
3-4 tablespoons of tahini (or more)
a few teaspoons of salt
the juice of a lemon
Paprika - ornament
Parsley - ornament
name: Hummus
